net.casper.data.model

Class CDataRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.casper.data.model.CDataRow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CDataRow
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents a row of data. This is essentially a wrapper around an array (Object[]). A rowset or cache container will store a collection of these objects, either in list or map format.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 111 $
    Author:
    Jonathan Liang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setRawData

        public void setRawData(Object[] row)
                throws CDataGridException
        Sets a raw Object[] representing this row. Warning - its possible to *completely* corrupt your row (and all dataset operations) by using this operation.
        Parameters:
        row -
        Throws:
        CDataGridException

      • toMap

        public Map toMap(CRowMetaData metaData)
          throws CDataGridException
        Given a meta-data object, returns a map representation This is a *silent* implementation. If there are fields that don't exist, it will just ignore and try its best to fill in as much data as possible.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Throws:
